title: Product Marketing Manager
description: Bridges product development, marketing, and sales by developing positioning, messaging, and go-to-market strategies that communicate product value to target audiences and enable sales teams to win deals.
core_responsibilities: Develop product positioning and messaging frameworks
Create buyer personas and understand customer journeys
Plan and execute go-to-market strategies for product launches
Create sales enablement content (battlecards, one-pagers, presentations)
Collaborate with product management on roadmap and feature priorities
Train and enable sales teams on product value propositions
Analyze win/loss data and market feedback
